forum.name: bugs and glitches
forum.description: post bugs and glitches you find here
forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: people "editing" in others worlds

comments.text: randomly people can "edit" and grab things in worlds, like their ring is white and when they grab something it gets stuck to them and it stays with them until everyone leaves
and refreshes the world. i see it most commonly with new players!
thanks, very good reminder. noticed this a few times too. we'll have to check what's causing this.

thread.latestCommentText: thanks, very good reminder. noticed this a few times too. we'll have to check what's causing this.
